Renderer.1 {
    BackgroundColor = #F5F5F5;
    BackgroundColorDisabled = #E6E6E6;
    BackgroundColorDown = #EBEBEB;
    BackgroundColorHover = white;
    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
    BorderColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
    BorderColorDown = black;
    BorderColorFocused = #1E1EB4;
    BorderColorHover = black;
    Borders = (1, 1, 1, 1);
    TextColor = #3C3C3C;
    TextColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
    TextColorDown = black;
    TextColorHover = black;
    Texture = None;
    TextureDisabled = None;
    TextureDown = None;
    TextureDownFocused = None;
    TextureDownHover = None;
    TextureFocused = None;
    TextureHover = None;
}

Renderer.2 {
    BackgroundColor = transparent;
    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
    Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
    TextColor = #3C3C3C;
    TextureBackground = None;
}

Renderer.3 {
    BackgroundColor = white;
    BorderColor = black;
    TextureBackground = None;
}

Panel.Panel1 {
    Position = (0, 10%);
    Size = (25%, 80%);

    Renderer {
        BackgroundColor = white;
        BorderColor = black;
        TextureBackground = None;
    }

    Button.Audio {
        Renderer = &1;
        Size = (100%, 10%);
        Text = Audio;
        TextSize = 13;
    }

    Button.Control {
        Position = (0, 10%);
        Renderer = &1;
        Size = (100%, 10%);
        Text = Control;
        TextSize = 13;
    }

    Button.Back {
        Position = (0, 30%);
        Renderer = &1;
        Size = (100%, 10%);
        Text = Back;
        TextSize = 13;
    }

    Button.GUI {
        Position = (0, 20%);
        Size = (100%, 10%);
        Text = GUI;
        TextSize = 13;

        Renderer {
            BackgroundColor = #F5F5F5;
            BackgroundColorDisabled = #E6E6E6;
            BackgroundColorDown = #EBEBEB;
            BackgroundColorHover = white;
            BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
            BorderColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
            BorderColorDown = black;
            BorderColorFocused = #1E1EB4;
            BorderColorHover = black;
            Borders = (1, 1, 1, 1);
            TextColor = #3C3C3C;
            TextColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
            TextColorDown = black;
            TextColorHover = black;
            Texture = None;
            TextureDisabled = None;
            TextureDown = None;
            TextureDownFocused = None;
            TextureDownHover = None;
            TextureFocused = None;
            TextureHover = None;
        }
    }
}

ScrollablePanel.SettingsPanel {
    ContentSize = (0, 0);
    Position = (25%, 10%);
    Renderer = &3;
    Size = (50%, 80%);

    ScrollablePanel.GUIPanel {
        ContentSize = (0, 0);
        Renderer = &3;
        Size = (100%, 100%);

        Label.Label4 {
            HorizontalAlignment = Center;
            Position = (5%, 15%);
            Renderer = &2;
            Size = (30%, 18);
            Text = "Aim Opacity";
            TextSize = 13;
        }

        Label.Label5 {
            HorizontalAlignment = Center;
            MaximumTextWidth = 120;
            Position = (5%, 25%);
            Renderer = &2;
            Size = (30%, 18);
            Text = "Network Infromation";
            TextSize = 13;
        }

        Label.Label3 {
            HorizontalAlignment = Center;
            Position = (5%, 5%);
            Size = (30%, 18);
            Text = "Aim configuration";
            TextSize = 13;

            Renderer {
                BackgroundColor = transparent;
                BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
                TextColor = #3C3C3C;
                TextureBackground = None;
            }
        }

        Slider.AimConfiguration {
            ChangeValueOnScroll = true;
            InvertedDirection = false;
            Maximum = 3;
            Minimum = 0;
            Position = (40%, 5%);
            Size = (55%, 16);
            Step = 1;
            Value = 0;

            Renderer {
                BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                BorderColorHover = black;
                Borders = (1, 1, 1, 1);
                TextureThumb = None;
                TextureThumbHover = None;
                TextureTrack = None;
                TextureTrackHover = None;
                ThumbColor = #F5F5F5;
                ThumbColorHover = white;
                TrackColor = #F5F5F5;
                TrackColorHover = white;
            }
        }

        Slider.AimOpacity {
            ChangeValueOnScroll = true;
            InvertedDirection = false;
            Maximum = 255;
            Minimum = 0;
            Position = (40%, 15%);
            Size = (55%, 16);
            Step = 1;
            Value = 0;

            Renderer {
                BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                BorderColorHover = black;
                Borders = (1, 1, 1, 1);
                TextureThumb = None;
                TextureThumbHover = None;
                TextureTrack = None;
                TextureTrackHover = None;
                ThumbColor = #F5F5F5;
                ThumbColorHover = white;
                TrackColor = #F5F5F5;
                TrackColorHover = white;
            }
        }

        CheckBox.NetworkInformation {
            Position = (40%, 25%);
            Size = (18, 18);
            TextSize = 13;

            Renderer {
                BackgroundColor = #F5F5F5;
                BackgroundColorDisabled = #E6E6E6;
                BackgroundColorHover = white;
                BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                BorderColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
                BorderColorFocused = #1E1EB4;
                BorderColorHover = black;
                Borders = (1, 1, 1, 1);
                CheckColor = #3C3C3C;
                CheckColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
                CheckColorHover = black;
                TextColor = #3C3C3C;
                TextColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
                TextColorHover = black;
                TextDistanceRatio = 0.2;
                TextureChecked = None;
                TextureCheckedDisabled = None;
                TextureCheckedFocused = None;
                TextureCheckedHover = None;
                TextureUnchecked = None;
                TextureUncheckedDisabled = None;
                TextureUncheckedFocused = None;
                TextureUncheckedHover = None;
            }
        }
    }

    ScrollablePanel.AudioPanel {
        ContentSize = (0, 0);
        Size = (100%, 100%);
        Visible = false;

        Renderer {
            BackgroundColor = white;
            BorderColor = black;
            TextureBackground = None;
        }

        Label.Label1 {
            HorizontalAlignment = Center;
            Position = (5%, 5%);
            Size = (30%, 18);
            Text = "Music volume";
            TextSize = 13;

            Renderer {
                BackgroundColor = transparent;
                BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
                TextColor = #3C3C3C;
                TextureBackground = None;
            }
        }

        Slider.MusicSlider {
            ChangeValueOnScroll = true;
            InvertedDirection = false;
            Maximum = 100;
            Minimum = 0;
            Position = (40%, 5%);
            Size = (55%, 16);
            Step = 1;
            Value = 100;

            Renderer {
                BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                BorderColorHover = black;
                Borders = (1, 1, 1, 1);
                TextureThumb = None;
                TextureThumbHover = None;
                TextureTrack = None;
                TextureTrackHover = None;
                ThumbColor = #F5F5F5;
                ThumbColorHover = white;
                TrackColor = #F5F5F5;
                TrackColorHover = white;
            }
        }

        Label.Label2 {
            HorizontalAlignment = Center;
            Position = (5%, 15%);
            Size = (30%, 18);
            Text = "Sound volume";
            TextSize = 13;

            Renderer {
                BackgroundColor = transparent;
                BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
                TextColor = #3C3C3C;
                TextureBackground = None;
            }
        }

        Slider.SoundSlider {
            ChangeValueOnScroll = true;
            InvertedDirection = false;
            Maximum = 100;
            Minimum = 0;
            Position = (40%, 15%);
            Size = (55%, 16);
            Step = 1;
            Value = 100;

            Renderer {
                BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
                BorderColorHover = black;
                Borders = (1, 1, 1, 1);
                TextureThumb = None;
                TextureThumbHover = None;
                TextureTrack = None;
                TextureTrackHover = None;
                ThumbColor = #F5F5F5;
                ThumbColorHover = white;
                TrackColor = #F5F5F5;
                TrackColorHover = white;
            }
        }
    }

    ScrollablePanel.ControlPanel {
        ContentSize = (0, 0);
        Size = (100%, 100%);
        Visible = false;

        Renderer {
            BackgroundColor = white;
            BorderColor = black;
            TextureBackground = None;
        }
    }
}
